title: Lack of funding shuts down Maine biotech research
description: What was supposed to have been a major biomedical research center in Maine when it was unveiled in 2005 is shutting down the centerpiece of its program due to lack of funding, according to the Bangor | What was supposed to have been a major biomedical research center in Maine when it was unveiled in 2005 is shutting down the centerpiece of its program due to lack of funding, according to the Bangor
